name: retighten
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
to make something tight again: When you remove the hot jars from the sterilizer, do not retighten their lids. Make sure that the screws are thoroughly retightened.
to make a rule, system, or law stronger again: In May, the Home Office retightened the policy and made the drug class B once again. This new development has prompted the committee to decide that the rules may have to be re-tightened.
